title: Sophisticated China Nanning City Escape Near Qingxiu Mountain
description: Discover ancient pagodas, winding riverbanks and the famous bamboo-topped peaks of Qingxiu Mountain with a stay at Crowne Plaza Nanning City Center, an IHG Hotel, the perfect place to savour the beauty of China’s south. Whether it’s fresh-caught fish, millennia-old market towns or treasures from antiquity, Nanning is a delight - laze by the hotel’s serene indoor pool, savour an abundance of upscale shopping outlets or savour sizzling local plates at Hoyo Chinese Restaurant.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Nanning City Center, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.148 Minzu Avenue, Qingxiu District, Nanning City, Nanning 530022, China
